an6.26:1.1: Tatra kho ayasma mahakaccano bhikkhu amantesi:
an6.26:1.3: “Avuso”ti kho te bhikkhu ayasmato mahakaccanassa paccassosum.
an6.26:1.7: Yavancidam tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sambadhe okasadhigamo anubuddho sattanam visuddhiya sokaparidevanam samatikkamaya dukkhadomanassanam atthangamaya nayassa adhigamaya nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya, yadidam cha anussatitthanani.
an6.26:2.3: ‘itipi so bhagava …pe… sattha devamanussanam buddho bhagava’ti.
an6.26:2.4: Yasmim, avuso, samaye ariyasavako tathagatam anussarati nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an6.26:2.5: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti, nikkhantam muttam vutthitam gedhamha.
an6.26:2.7: Sa kho so, avuso, ariyasavako sabbaso akasasamena cetasa viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena.
an6.26:2.8: Idampi kho, avuso, arammanam karitva evam’idhekacce satta visuddhidhamma bhavanti.

an6.26:7.1: Puna caparam, avuso, ariyasavako devata anussarati:
an6.26:7.3: Yatharupaya saddhaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tattha upapanna; mayhampi tatharupa saddha samvijjati.
an6.26:7.7: pannaya samannagata ta devata ito cuta tattha upapanna; mayhampi tatharupa panna samvijjati’ti.
an6.26:7.8: Yasmim, avuso, samaye ariyasavako attano ca tasanca devatanam saddhanca silanca sutanca caganca pannanca anussarati nevassa tasmim samaye ragapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na dosapariyutthitam cittam hoti, na mohapariyutthitam cittam hoti;
an6.26:7.9: ujugatamevassa tasmim samaye cittam hoti, nikkhantam muttam vutthitam gedhamha.
an6.26:7.11: Sa kho so, avuso, ariyasavako sabbaso akasasamena cetasa viharati vipulena mahaggatena appamanena averena abyapajjena.
an6.26:7.12: Idampi kho, avuso, arammanam karitva evam’idhekacce satta visuddhidhamma bhavanti.
an6.26:8.2: Yavancidam tena bhagavata janata passata arahata sammasambuddhena sambadhe okasadhigamo anubuddho sattanam visuddhiya sokaparidevanam samatikkamaya dukkhadomanassanam atthangamaya nayassa adhigamaya nibbanassa sacchikiriyaya, yadidam cha anussatitthanani”ti.
